data.product_name: UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool - As Seen on Shark Tank - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat - Easy Tool for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (2 Pack, Gray & White)

summary.topics: carseat, harness, seat, buckle, daughter, strap, car, granddaughter, unbuckle, child, unbuckled, kid, invention, locked, clip, arthritis, her, grandma, able, mom, hand, she, breeze, nail, herself, keep, bought, older, product, his, install, my, help, using, still, it, super, ha, helpful, love, over, little, trouble, made, very, old, with, me, and us

durable.review: The Unbuckle Me works exactly as described.  Its easy to use and I havent broken a nail since I received It.  It makes releasing my grand daughters car seat a breeze.
Works exactly as promised. My 5 year old uses every time he needs to get out of his car seat and is proud he can do it himself.

easy.review: This product made unbuckling the seat harness of my child's car seat very easy

I bought this b/c my 4 y/o daughter was having trouble unbuckling herself from her 5-point harness carseat.  It is extremely lightweight and super EASY to use!  She keeps it in the side of her carseat (where she keeps other toys) so it's easy for her to access, and then when we get somewhere, she pulls it out, puts it over the clip, presses down, and voila! she's unbuckled!  It is nice for her to be able to do it herself!  She likes using it too b/c it's something she can do by herself.  I'm super happy with this purchase. I keep one in each car.
So very easy to use. I have shoulder issues and my mom has issues with her hands. This clip has made getting the kids out a lot easier with little pain
It was very easy to install and it works just like it was advertised. We are very satisfied!
Definitely easy to install and our 4 year old granddaughter is able to release the buckle herself now. Great invention!!

quality.review: The silicone grey part peels off quickly, but it still does its job so I dont mind that.
My 5year old son loves this! He can finally unbuckle himself! He feels so independent and it helps me save time getting out of car since he can actually help now.
I love this thing! Great invention! I have Britax car seats and my 6 year old can now unbuckle her own car seat. She loves the independence and I love not having to climb back there to do it for her.
These are great for kids who need a little extra help with the bottom buckle! Has made car line a breeze!

This is a great tool if you have little to no strength in your hands to unbuckle any car seat or seatbelt. Its a WIN!..WIN! if you or someone you know has trouble unbuckling child car seats or seatbelts. It works every single time with little to no effort. Just place the buckle between the unbuckleme tool, line it up over the buckle and squeeze the tool for pain free ease of success.

Omgggg freaking Love it.. Was thinking that I have to cut my nails off (now that my granddaughter is a whole 13months old) and we can drive around.. My daughter in law told me about this amazing button..and we are in and out the car seat..
I love these! I have Very long stiletto nails and cant unbuckle my 2 yo without these clips. My 77 yo grandma (with arthritis) can unbuckle my daughter now as well! Life saver for us.
Purchased for my mom, who is suffering from the early stages of arthritis and she loves it! Very helpful when trying to move the little one out of their high chair or car seat.

carseat.review: Product works, just OK, on graco car seat.  Struggle to expand enough to surround buckle frame, then needs both small Grandma hands to get enough pressure. Does not work on Cosco car seat as not enough depth and opening.

buckle.review: It is still difficult to use when buckles are low and close to the childs legs.

There was a time I accidentally locked my children in the car.  If we had this tool, my older child may have been able to get himself out and unlock the door for me (that he had locked which caused this).  My CPST friend recommended this and it has been very helpful.  If that happens in the future, this will be so handy.  For everyday use, my older child usually unbuckles himself now using this tool.  This saves me some time with the constant in-and-out.  I think it would be practical to have a string / lanyard with a breakaway clasp attached or some way to mount it somewhere accessible.  My child loops it over the handle above the window.

daughter.review: I bought this mainly for emergencies if my 4yo were to be left in the car, so she can unbuckle and get out or honk the horn. We practiced a few times, and now she uses it daily to unbuckle herself, which she is very excited about.

My daughter is seven and shes very petite for her age and she always struggles to get her car seat unbuckled.  We have to do car line for her school and it was a challenge for her to get unbuckled and I wasnt allowed to get out and help her. So we gave these a shot and its perfect. She has no issues now getting her car seat unbuckled. I initially bought the unbuckle helpers that hook on to the car seat strap. It would come off the strap and my kids didnt like how it hooked on the strap they said it was uncomfortable. So I tried these ones and they work much better.

review_types.best_review: I bought this b/c my 4 y/o daughter was having trouble unbuckling herself from her 5-point harness carseat.  It is extremely lightweight and super EASY to use!  She keeps it in the side of her carseat (where she keeps other toys) so it's easy for her to access, and then when we get somewhere, she pulls it out, puts it over the clip, presses down, and voila! she's unbuckled!  It is nice for her to be able to do it herself!  She likes using it too b/c it's something she can do by herself.  I'm super happy with this purchase. I keep one in each car.
review_types.worst_review: I always struggled to get my toddler grandson out of his car seat!  No more!
